languages.text: {n}Пощада добродушно поглядывает на хладных торговцев.{/n} "Я и есть старший, Ваша Светлость. Ты разве не сказала этого свое{mf|му|й} спутни{mf|ку|це}... Джай?" {n}Имя контрабандистки срывается с уст Пощады непринужденно и очень привычно.{/n} "И если вопрос уважения к старшинству так трогает вас, то свой пост, к слову, я занимаю куда дольше, чем вы — свой".

{n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

Джай?" {n}Имя контрабандистки срывается с уст Пощады непринужденно и очень привычно.{/n} "И если вопрос уважения к старшинству так трогает вас, то свой пост, к слову, я занимаю куда дольше, чем вы — свой".

languages.text: {n}悯慈和蔼地注视着其他冷市商人。{/n}“我是这个圈子里地位最高的人，大人。这件事情，莫非你没有向你的同伴好好解释一下吗……婕伊？”{n}悯慈轻而易举地将婕伊的名字脱口而出。{/n}“既然您这么在意资历，那您一定会感到欣慰。因为我担任这个位置的时间，恐怕远比您担任行商浪人的时间要久得多。”
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈和蔼地注视着其他冷市商人。{/n}“我是这个圈子里地位最高的人，大人。这件事情，莫非你没有向你的同伴好好解释一下吗……婕伊？”{n}悯慈轻而易举地将婕伊的名字脱口而出。{/n}“既然您这么在意资历，那您一定会感到欣慰。因为我担任这个位置的时间，恐怕远比您担任行商浪人的时间要久得多。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}マーシーはコールド・トレーダーたちに温和な視線を送る。{/n}「私はここで最も階級の高い者です。説明しなかったのか？ジェイ？」{n}その密輸人の名前が、マーシーの舌からすらすらと親しげにこぼれ落ちる。{/n}「あなたが年功を重んじるのであれば、私はあなたよりずっと長くこの地位にいることを知っていただければ、きっとご安心いただけると思いますよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーはコールド・トレーダーたちに温和な視線を送る。{/n}「私はここで最も階級の高い者です。説明しなかったのか？ジェイ？」{n}その密輸人の名前が、マーシーの舌からすらすらと親しげにこぼれ落ちる。{/n}「あなたが年功を重んじるのであれば、私はあなたよりずっと長くこの地位にいることを知っていただければ、きっとご安心いただけると思いますよ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy mira amistosamente a los otros Comerciantes Fríos.{/n} «Soy la persona de mayor rango aquí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿No se lo habías explicado a tu acompañante... Jae?». {n}El nombre de pila de la contrabandista fluye con familiaridad de la lengua de Mercy.{/n} «Si tanto le preocupa la veteranía, le alegrará saber que llevo ocupando mi cargo mucho más tiempo que usted el suyo».
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy mira amistosamente a los otros Comerciantes Fríos.{/n} «Soy la persona de mayor rango aquí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿No se lo habías explicado a tu acompañante... Jae?». {n}El nombre de pila de la contrabandista fluye con familiaridad de la lengua de Mercy.{/n} «Si tanto le preocupa la veteranía, le alegrará saber que llevo ocupando mi cargo mucho más tiempo que usted el suyo».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy lance un regard cordial aux autres marchands.{/n} « J'occupe le rang le plus élevé de toute cette assemblée, Votre Seigneurie. N'as-tu donc rien expliqué à ton {mf|ami|amie}... Jae ? » {n}Le nom de la contrebandière glisse sur la langue de Mercy avec une familiarité déconcertante.{/n} « Et si le rang est si important à vos yeux, vous serez {mf|rassuré|rassurée} d'apprendre que je suis à mon poste depuis bien plus longtemps que vous n'êtes au vôtre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy lance un regard cordial aux autres marchands.{/n} « J'occupe le rang le plus élevé de toute cette assemblée, Votre Seigneurie. N'as-tu donc rien expliqué à ton {mf|ami|amie}... Jae ? » {n}Le nom de la contrebandière glisse sur la langue de Mercy avec une familiarité déconcertante.{/n} « Et si le rang est si important à vos yeux, vous serez {mf|rassuré|rassurée} d'apprendre que je suis à mon poste depuis bien plus longtemps que vous n'êtes au vôtre. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy blickt die Kalthändler freundlich an.{/n} "Ich habe hier den höchsten Rang inne, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Habt Ihr Eurem Gefährten das nicht erklärt ... Jae?" {n}Der Name der Schmugglerin geht Mercy leicht über die Lippen, als wäre er sehr vertraut mit ihm.{/n} "Und wenn Euch der Respekt vor dem Rang so wichtig ist, dann wird es Euch sicher trösten, dass ich meine Position schon viel länger bekleide als Ihr Eure."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

Jae?" {n}Der Name der Schmugglerin geht Mercy leicht über die Lippen, als wäre er sehr vertraut mit ihm.{/n} "Und wenn Euch der Respekt vor dem Rang so wichtig ist, dann wird es Euch sicher trösten, dass ich meine Position schon viel länger bekleide als Ihr Eure."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Merhamet, güleç bir yüzle Soğuk Tacirlere bakıyor.{/n} "Buradaki en kıdemli kişi benim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu yoldaşına açıklamadın mı... Jae?" {n}Merhamet'in dili, kaçakçının ön adını rahat bir tanıdıklıkla telaffuz ediyor.{/n} "Kıdeme saygı gösterme konusunda bu kadar kaygılıysanız mevkime sizden çok daha uzun süredir sahip olduğumu bilmek, içinizi rahatlatacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy casts a genial look over the Cold Traders.{/n} "I am the most senior-ranking person here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Didn't you explain this to your companion... Jae?" {n}The smuggler's given name rolls off Mercy's tongue with easy familiarity.{/n} "And if you are so concerned with showing respect for seniority, you will be comforted to know that I have held my position far longer than you have yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhamet, Soğuk Tacirlere güleç bir yüzle bakıyor.{/n} "Buradaki en kıdemli kişi benim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu yoldaşına açıklamadın mı... Jae?" {n}Merhamet'in dili, kaçakçının ön adını rahat bir tanıdıklıkla telaffuz ediyor.{/n} "Ve kıdeme saygı göstermek konusunda bu kadar kaygılıysanız, pozisyonuma sizden çok daha uzun süredir sahip olduğumu bilmek içinizi rahatlatacaktır."
traits.speaker: Mercy
